Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Silken America Vigo Hotel places you in the heart of Vigo, walking distance from Centro Cultural Caixanova and Estuary Marine Station. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Santa Maria Church and A Pedra Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 45 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Vigo? This hotel has facilities measuring 699 square feet (65 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 12:30 PM Check-out time is 12:30 PM
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Silken America Vigo Hotel places you in the heart of Vigo, walking distance from Centro Cultural Caixanova and Estuary Marine Station. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Santa Maria Church and A Pedra Market.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Centro Cultural Caixanova - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Estuary Marine Station - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Maria Church - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
A Pedra Market - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Centro Comercial A Laxe - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Centro Principe - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of Contemporary Art - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Sargadelos Gallery - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Castro Fortress - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Castro Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Plaza America - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Nosa Senora da Guia Shrine - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Quinones de Leon Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Castrelos Auditorium - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Castrelos Park - 3 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Silken America Vigo Hotel is Vigo (VGO-Peinador) - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
